[[File:Other Hands 27.jpg|right|thumb|''Other Hands'' issue 27|250px]]
'''''Other Hands'' 27''' is an issue of ''[[Other Hands]]'', a magazine devoted to ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]]''. The theme of the issue is "Magic in the Third Age".

*'''Published:''' October [[1999]]
*'''ISSN:''' 1081-8359
*'''Editing:''' [[Chris Seeman]], Charles Watteyne
*'''Linguistics:''' Jesse Dallin, [[David Salo]]
*'''Pagemaking:''' Quentin Westcott
*'''Artwork:''' [[Bridget Buxton]], Quentin Westcott

==Contents==
''Article name - (Author's name) [Publisher's notes]''

*Editorial - ([[Chris Seeman]]) [1 pg]
*Magic in the Third Age - (Martin Burke) [a comprehensive overview of how magic works; 18 pgs]
*Taurinafanto - ([[Graham Staplehurst]]) [epic ready-to-run adventure set in TA 1635 Rhovanion; 18 pgs]
*Mithril Feature: Enchanters of Mirkwood - ([[Chris Seeman]]) [2 pgs]
*Rastarin's Log - ([[Bridget Buxton]]) [episode nine; 7 pgs]
